title: IBaseFlangeFeatureData.UseDefaultBendAllowance
description: Gets whether the bend allowance from the original sheet metal feature is used in this sheet metal base flange feature.
returns: True uses the parent sheet metal bend allowance, false uses a custom bend allowance
remarks:
If this property is false, then use
IBaseFlangeFeatureData::GetCustomBendAllowance
to get the custom bend allowance used to
initialize
this base flange.
Whether to use the default bend allowance is set during the initialization of this base flange and cannot be changed.
